elements.description:
List a FamilySearch person's facts.

Basic example:

    <fs-person-facts person-id="PPP-PPPP"></fs-person-facts>

properties.name: ignoreVitals
properties.description:
Whether to ignore (hide) vital facts. This is useful when
you are also using the fs-person-vitals component.

properties.name: _selectingNewFactType
properties.description:
Whether the user has indicated they want to add a new fact type
and are still in the fact type selection process.

properties.name: _newFactType
properties.description: Fact type the user has chosen for a new fact

properties.name: _saveUrl
properties.description: URL that facts will be saved to

elements.name: FSPersonFacts

attributes.name: ignore-vitals
attributes.description:
Whether to ignore (hide) vital facts. This is useful when
you are also using the fs-person-vitals component.
